column5: My husband recently had nasal passage surgery and feared the worse of being cancer, as they had thought. Well he went to the Doctor's today and it is not cancer.....But his cannabolistic twin is doing fine and will be going back to an unknown planet soon....  Thank you each and every one for prayers and support  Lorissa
Best news he's had in years I'm sure....
Been waiting to hear.  That's fantastic news Lorissa!!

Thanx Guys!  He has been telling friends and family he had a twin released and has gone back to an unknown planet...So his family gave it a name.....  We are ready for some fishing! Lets go!  Lorissa,  he wants to thank everyone for prayers and thoughts...  Bye have a fishtastic weekend!
